text: Hope everything turns out to be okay <3 stay strong and hang in there. Everything shall pass with time.

Same thing was happening for me. They did say that after March 25th, they were going to spend the next few weeks readjusting peopleâ€™s aid and issuing out refunds. I barely got my refund on Monday and not too long after, the charges were updated on my account. It showed my actual charges as well as what I got refunded for (I.e. housing). At this point, all you can really do is wait. Hope you get refunded soon!
